name: ableism
description: discrimination in favour of able-bodied people

name: ageism
description: stereotyping and/or discrimination against individuals or groups on the basis of their age

name: alloism
description: systemic and systematic prejudice and discrimination against people who are asexual

name: anti-Blackness
description: prejudice, discrimination, or antagonism by an individual, community, or institution against a person or people on the basis of their Blackness

name: antisemitism
description: hostility to, prejudice, or discrimination against Jews

name: biphobia
description: irrational fear of, and aversion to, bisexuality or bisexual persons

name: catcalling
description: the act of shouting harassing and often sexually suggestive, threatening, or derisive comments at someone publicly

name: classism
description: prejudice or discrimination on the basis of social class

name: enbyphobia
description: dislike of or prejudice against non-binary people

name: ethnocentrism
description: evaluation of other cultures according to preconceptions originating in the standards and customs of one’s own culture

name: eugenics
description: practice or advocacy of improving the human species by selectively mating people with specific desirable hereditary traits

name: fatphobia
description: prejudice, or discrimination of fat people

name: homophobia
description: dislike of or prejudice against gay people

name: islamophobia
description: fear of, hatred of, or prejudice against the religion of Islam or Muslims in general

name: lesbophobia
description: hatred, fear and disgust towards lesbians

name: misogynoir
description: hatred of, contempt for, or prejudice against black women or girls

name: misogyny
description: hatred of, contempt for, or prejudice against women or girls

name: nativism
description: the policy of protecting the interests of native-born or established inhabitants against those of immigrants

name: queerphobia
description: fear or hatred of queer people

name: racism
description: prejudice, discrimination, or antagonism by an individual, community, or institution against a person or people on the basis of their membership of a particular racial or ethnic group, typically one that is a minority or marginalized

name: religious imperialism
description: active suppression of other religions

name: sexism
description: prejudice, stereotyping, or discrimination, typically against women, on the basis of sex

name: sizeism
description: prejudice or discrimination on the grounds of a person’s size or weight

name: toxic masculinity
description: a set of attitudes and ways of behaving stereotypically associated with or expected of men, regarded as having a negative impact on men and on society as a whole

name: transphobia
description: dislike of or prejudice against transsexual or transgender people

name: whorephobia
description: hatred of, oppression of, violence towards, and discrimination against sex worke
